solution_mappings.sudden voice call issue for all devices: There were cell unavailabilities in the site, Clear the alarms solved the issue
solution_mappings.sudden coverage drop for all devices hua: KLPET1 Site on aired and solved
solution_mappings.cannot browse internet, always no data c: The mobile network mode was set to 2G/3G mode after enabling LTE mode in mobile device solved the issue
solution_mappings.unable to perform transaction via pos po: Visited and found as a POS machine issue
solution_mappings.poor mobitel service for long time all d: The nearest site isn't covering the area checked using viewshed, so power increase in the site to max values.
solution_mappings.indoor call drop, data speed and coverag: Power incresed of the site (Not resolved) Solution - Repeater
solution_mappings.the connection is not working. router no: Need coverage improvement plan (visited and checked)
solution_mappings.call issue/ already activated volte/afte: Need 4G coverage improvement plan.  Already planned a new site( 6.874391, 79.96332)
solution_mappings.signal levels for the router is degraded: Changing the router location solved the issue
solution_mappings.the customer reported that their data co: Serving cell power increase to enhance the coverage
solution_mappings.network is slow when using pocket router: The customer uses two separate VPNs for their office work. They have noted that while their data speed is good without a VPN, it drops significantly when a VPN is in use. So the issue is related to their VPN connections
solution_mappings.data and voice is not working at 33bc cl: IBS extension for 33BC floor, Good coverage observed where IBS is implemented (41 and 43)
solution_mappings.constantly connection disruption and ave: Because of the rain the coverage is varying, cell power is already increased
solution_mappings.unable to perform transactions through p: POS machine is getting randomly offline for some period. So a visit arranged for on site analysis
solution_mappings.intermittent connect to lte network dong: Coudln't test the SIM cause, it is a micro sim so visit arranged
solution_mappings.no signal during power outages mobitel d: Direct BTS team to rectify battery Backup
solution_mappings.mobile signal issues (connection drop),: After contacting and checking with customer mentioned that the issue is with the Airtel connection. (There are no Mobitel service issue other customers in the area confirmed)
solution_mappings.data throughput slow s10 router no issue: Data bundle was over and renewed on 25th Aug. Then gave a reset after that issue solved
solution_mappings.call quality issue smart phones no issue: Enabling Vo-LTE  and Vo-WIFI. (As there is a wifi unit at the location)
solution_mappings.mobitel signal inside the hotel premises: Cx didn't mentioned the time, no issue with coverage or IBS
solution_mappings.there is no mobile signal in some locati: Visited and checked the coverage, from visit observed no IBS antenna in the area. So need IBS extension for New Banquet office. To the City club building previously visited and proposed an IBS, the solution in approval process
solution_mappings.poor data speed at every location. sudde: Device Issue. Proposed to change the device.
solution_mappings.the mentioned sim is not working. checke: Only a onnection is not working, other connections are working. So need to check and replace a SIM
solution_mappings.call quality issue mobile phone vswr alr: Direct team to clear VSWR alarm
